name: AzureIoTuAmqp
description:
This is a preview CocoaPods 
release of the Azure C uAMQP library.
prepare_command:
# Assemble the module.modulemap file
echo "module AzureIoTuAmqp [system][extern_c] {" > module.modulemap
quote_thing='"'
for filename in inc/azure_uamqp_c/*.h; do
    echo "    header $quote_thing$filename$quote_thing" >> module.modulemap
done
echo "    export *" >> module.modulemap
echo "}" >> module.modulemap
# Done assembling module.modulemap file
